title: Jim Jim requeim
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Ken Newman
brief_description: An animated story depicting the abduction of a young girl’s dog, by the North African Condor, Polly, that her grandparent’s have adopted. Music written and directed by Sue Johnson.
